attributes.action: stop building mosques and temples that do not fit in with this countrys buildings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop building mosques and temples that do not fit in with this countrys buildings."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15271.asp

Prime Minister's Office
